argument.name: Element_List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of array elements matching Filter.

argument.name: expression
argument.description: A character filter expression that selects elements in an array.

page.description: Returns a CR-LF delimited list of indices of array elements that match a filter.
page.discussion: The <ARRAY>.MATCHING() methods returns a CR-LF delimited list of elements from a single dimensional array that match a filter.
page.example: dim p[10] as P p[1].fname="Selwyn" p[1].lname="Rabins" p[2].fname="Lenny" p[2].lname="Forziati" p[3].fname="Cian" p[3].lname="Chambliss" p[4].fname="Richard" p[4].lname="Rabins" ? p.matching("lname=\"Rabins\"") = [1] [4]

section.description: Note : The output includes the square brackets around each index
